Title: Black and Blue
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Kim Rome, Gwen Sigan (executive story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: While CPD tries to take down a drug kingpin, Atwater faces a tough choice.
